sentences.en: As she reached a road intersection, a Ford sedan stopped.
sentences.cn: 她走到交叉路口时, 一辆福特牌轿车停了下来.

sentences.en: Bridges are used to avoid the intersection of a railway and a highway.
sentences.cn: 桥用来避免铁路和公路直接交叉.

sentences.en: Follow this road and see that intersection there?
sentences.cn: 沿着这条路走,你看到那个十字路口了 吗 ?

sentences.en: In System / 38 graphics, the default result of the intersection of two or more colors.
sentences.cn: 在IBMSystem/38图形技术中, 系统将两种或两两种以上颜色合成后的自然结果.

sentences.en: It was blocking the intersection while people were trying to cross the street.
sentences.cn: 当人们都要过十字路口的时候,它堵塞在那儿.

sentences.en: Richard took the truck across the intersection heading north.
sentences.cn: 理查德把车开过交叉路口向北驶去.

sentences.en: Strike is the trace of the intersection of an obliquelyinclined plane with a horizontal reference plane.
sentences.cn: 走向是倾斜平面与水平参考成交线的迹线.

sentences.en: The car stopped at a street intersection.
The driver hesitated at the intersection, then turned right.
sentences.cn: 司机在交叉路口停了一会, 而后向右驶去.

sentences.en: The intersection of the q 1 - and the q 2 surfaces, defines a curve.
sentences.cn: q1 和q2曲面的交线定义了一条曲线.

sentences.en: The main business section is three or four blocks south of the intersection.
sentences.cn: 从交叉路口向南过3个或4个街区就是主要的商业区.

sentences.en: The policeman regulated traffic at the intersection.
sentences.cn: 警察在交叉路口指挥交通.

sentences.en: The ship stopped at at the intersection of two main canals.
sentences.cn: 这艘船停在两条大运河的交汇处。

sentences.en: The traffic banked up at the intersection.
sentences.cn: 车辆在交叉路口聚积起来.

sentences.en: There is a stop sign at an intersection.
sentences.cn: 在交叉路口处有停车标志.

sentences.en: We crossed at a busy intersection.
sentences.cn: 我们穿过了一个繁忙的道路交叉口。

words.tran_cn: 交叉；[交]十字路口；交集；交叉点

phrases.tran_cn: 道路交汇处；道路交叉口；道路交叉

trans.tran_cn: 横断，横切，交叉，相交，交叉点，交叉线，[数]交集
trans.tran_en: a place where roads, lines etc cross each other, especially where two roads meet
